conversation.subtitle: Not just returning data — understanding business context, giving advice, asking follow-ups, setting actions

messages.content: Which SKU had the highest return rate last week?

Sneakers SKU-2031, return rate 12.3%, main reason: sizing runs small (68% of returns).
Suggestion: Add a "runs half size small" note on the product page. SKU-1892 made a similar change and return rate dropped 40%.
Talked to the supplier, they'll adjust the last next batch. How long will my current stock last?

At 43 pairs daily average over the past 7 days, current stock of 312 pairs will last 7.3 days.
However, if returns drop to normal levels (~5%), net sales will increase and you'd run out in about 6 days.
Want me to draft a restock order?
Not yet, let's wait for the new batch. Keep an eye on it — alert me when stock drops below 100 pairs.
Done. Inventory alert set: you'll be notified when SKU-2031 drops below 100 pairs.

product.capabilitiesSubtitle: From data integration to decision output, covering the full enterprise decision workflow

capabilities.title: Natural Language Queries
capabilities.description: Ask questions in everyday language — no SQL or BI tools required. The system automatically understands intent, queries data, and returns structured answers.

capabilities.title: Multi-Source Data Integration
capabilities.description: Standardized integration with various enterprise data sources via CLI tools, including e-commerce platforms, ad systems, ERPs, finance software, and databases.

capabilities.title: Domain Knowledge Encoding
capabilities.description: Encode industry expert experience into reusable Skills, giving the Agent professional judgment capabilities for vertical industries.

capabilities.title: Decision Recommendations
capabilities.description: Goes beyond returning data — provides actionable recommendations with business context and explains the reasoning behind them.

capabilities.title: Real-time Monitoring & Alerts
capabilities.description: Set business metric thresholds and the Agent continuously monitors, proactively notifying you of anomalies — from reactive queries to proactive alerts.

capabilities.title: Multi-turn Dialogue
capabilities.description: Support continuous follow-ups, additional conditions, and perspective switching — explore issues in depth like talking to a business expert.

workflowSteps.title: Connect Data Sources
workflowSteps.description: Connect your business systems via CLI tools — e-commerce platforms, ad systems, ERPs, databases, etc. Standardized interfaces, no ETL needed.

workflowSteps.title: Configure Domain Knowledge
workflowSteps.description: Select or customize industry Skills, encoding your business judgment logic into the system so the Agent understands your industry.

workflowSteps.title: Ask in Natural Language
workflowSteps.description: Ask questions in everyday language. The Agent automatically invokes tools, analyzes data, and combines Skills to give professional answers and recommendations.

workflowSteps.title: Get Decision Recommendations
workflowSteps.description: Receive decision recommendations with reasoning, then continue asking follow-ups, set alerts, or let the Agent execute subsequent actions.
